com.github.mkolisnyk.sirius.client.ui.controls

Class TableView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mkolisnyk.sirius.client.ui.controls.Control
      • com.github.mkolisnyk.sirius.client.ui.controls.TableView

  • public class TableView
extends Control
    Major class corresponding to compound elements processing. In addition to base operations inherited from Control class, this class also contains functionality to operate with sub-items and rows.
    Author:
    Mykola Kolisnyk

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableView(Page parentValue, org.openqa.selenium.By locatorValue)
      Default constructor which binds page the control belongs to and the locator to find the element on page.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TableView

        public TableView(Page parentValue,
                 org.openqa.selenium.By locatorValue)
        Default constructor which binds page the control belongs to and the locator to find the element on page.
        Parameters:
        parentValue - the instance of the page class containing current control.
        locatorValue - the string used to locate current control.

    • Method Detail

      • getItemsCount

        public int getItemsCount()
        Calculates and returns the available items count. For tables it usually corresponds to the number of rows.
        Returns:
        available items count.

      • getItem

        public Control getItem(int index)
        Generates and returns control object which corresponds to the compound object item specified by index.
        Parameters:
        index - the item order number.
        Returns:
        control object corresponding to item.

      • isNotEmpty

        public boolean isNotEmpty(int timeout)
        Checks if current compound element contains any items.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time limit to wait.
        Returns:
        true - element contains items, false - otherwise.

      • isNotEmpty

        public boolean isNotEmpty()
        Checks if current compound element contains any items. This is overloaded version which waits for the default timeout.
        Returns:
        true - element contains items, false - otherwise.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty(int timeout)
        Checks if current compound element doesn't contains any items.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time limit to wait.
        Returns:
        true - element doesn't contain items, false - otherwise.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if current compound element doesn't contains any items. This is overloaded version which waits for the default timeout.
        Returns:
        true - element doesn't contain items, false - otherwise.

      • getSubItemLocator

        public org.openqa.selenium.By getSubItemLocator(java.lang.String name,
                                                int index)
        Provides fully qualified locator for sub-item for specified index and name.
        Parameters:
        name - the sub-item name.
        index - the item index.
        Returns:
        sub-item locator.

      • getSubItem

        public <T extends Control> T getSubItem(java.lang.String name,
                                        int index,
                                        java.lang.Class<T> itemType)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Common method which generates control object for specific sub-item of specific type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the control class to cast sub-item control to.
        Parameters:
        name - the sub-item name.
        index - the item index.
        itemType - the control type to cast sub-item instance to.
        Returns:
        control object for specific sub-item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - class cast exceptions.

      • getSubItem

        public Control getSubItem(java.lang.String name,
                          int index)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Overloaded getSubItem(String, int, Class) which retrieves returning control type from the sub-item data.
        Parameters:
        name - sub-item name.
        index - item index.
        Returns:
        control object for specific sub-item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - class cast exceptions.
